msbt.message: You know what today is, right?<10_4 /> Festivaaaaaale! It's a whole day of dreams and dancing and feathers!Maybe take a nap or get a cup of coffee or something if you plan on keeping up with me, .
So you haven't found any feathers yet, huh? Well, don't give up! Get out that net and start swingin'!Just like my favorite hat, Festivale NEEDS feathers, !

You know how when you're looking for , you can only find ?Ugh, so frustrating! It's like right nowI'm looking everywhere for .And I bet you'll find a million of 'em without even trying! Um, if that does happen, I'm open to a trade
Looking good, ! My feet are twitching just looking at you. I am readyto DANCE.
Wow. Absolutely dazzling. A tour de Festivale force.Oh! I was talking about my own outfit. But now that you mention it, you look pretty good too!
So have you met Pavé yet? Quite a character, huh? And his feather game is ON POINT.Yeah, it's pretty cool to have a fellow danseur visiting. That's Frenchbut I don't know exactly what it means.
Festivale is a time when I can really challenge myself as a dancer and push society's boundaries.Don't worry—I won't push them too far. We all remember what happened last time.
If you see any rainbow feathers floating down from the sky today, don't be alarmed. It's Festivale!If you see them on any other day, it means my pillow exploded.

Sure, dancing alone in front of the mirror is great, but dancing out in the streets with others is better!And if we could somehow get island- wide mirrors installed out here, that would be the best EVER!
So, how am I looking? A little more fabulous than usual? You've gotta step up your game for Festivale!Of course, no one can compete with Pavé. Not that I'm trying I'm trying so incredibly hard
Festivale is in full swing! So what are you waiting for? Dance with me, !
There's no need to make small talk when you're dancing. Just let your body do the talking!Mine says!
Wondering how I can dance all day without ever getting tired? Ha HA! That's my little secret.I actually sleep 22 hours a day.
It's Festivale today, whether you're inside or outside.That means you can't escape the DANCE, no matter where you go.

Oh, I'm just taking a short break from the festivities in here. Festivale can be overwhelming sometimes.Do NOT tell anyone I said that. If anyone asks, I partied so hard that Festivale asked ME to take a break.
Isn't Festivale the most incredible holiday? For one day only, all of our worries are forgotten.It's almost likewe live on a tropical island without a care in the world
I'd show you some of the moves I've been working on for Festivale, but I'm not sure there's enough spaceI don't want to break anything. And "break-dancing insurance" isn't a thing. I asked.

You know about rainbow feathers, right? Please tell me you know about the rainbow feathers!OK, so feathers come in different colors, right? But certain rare ones have rainbows on them!I don't want to spoil anything, but if you see one falling from the sky, you gotta nab it!
Ahhhthere's nothing like waking up and remembering that today is Festivale, .It's like a mug of fresh . The BEST way to start your day!
Ah, taking a little break as well, huh? Yeah, I forgot that dancing can be a workout! Especially the way I do it.
And so we come to the part of Festivale that I like to call Festivale After Dark!It'spretty much the same thing. World-class dancing and celebrating. But it's dark. Well, outside anyway.
Hang onis that what I think it is? ?I'm not going to pretend I don't DESPERATELY need one of those.Is there any way you'd trade for my ?
Sure!
Sorry, not interested.
OK, hear me out. I would be SUPER jealous of you right nowIF you had .Hypothetically, of coursewould you want to trade your feather for my ?
Sure!
Sorry, not interested.
Alright, we've got a deal! Let's do this.
Whoa, really? Way to be decisive! I would have struggled with that for hours.
Thanks, !
Pleasure doing business with you, . Ha HA!
Whoa, whoa, don't worry about it. I can ask someone else.
Ahh, that's fine. I'll ask around some more.
Let me just make sure I've got this right. You want to give me of your In exchange for of my , yeah?
Yep! Let's do it.
Never mind.
